name: Harvest Time (itch) (Exedo)
description:
Oh no! It’s one week until the big harvest festival and we don’t have enough cash! Can you grow enough crops to make enough before the big day?

How To Play:

Use the arrow keys to move the player, drag crops to the farmland to plant them and click to harvest. Press E to open your inventory. Visit the trucks to sell your crops, and visit the shop to buy new seeds!

Tools used

Engine - Godot 3.5

Art - Aseprite

Sounds - bfxr

Music - BeepBox
